title: What are some important chapters from class 11th maths in JEE Mains? - Quora

response.answer_text: All the chapters are important in mathematics as at times you may get a mixed question, but there are few chapters which are exceptionally important to be studied. Conic Sections(Circle,Parabola,Ellipse, Hyperbola) - A highly important chapter , which usually has high weightage in JEE papers.PnC - You may not find many questions from this chapter but it's knowledge will be useful for covering questions of probability( Class 12th), and probability is a very important chapter.Complex Nos. - Something many students find difficult, if you master this then you'll have an edge over othersThat's it!

1)Trigonometric applications (atleast one) 2)Complex numbers(you may expected to get 1 question atleast) 3)Permutations &combinations and also binomial theorem (one question compulsory ) 4)Straight lines(atleast one compulsory) 5)sequence &Series (expected to get 1 question) 6)3D geometry (atleast one) 7)limits and derivatives (atleast two questions) 8)Mathematical reasoning (atleast one) 9)Probability (atleast two) 10)Statistics(atleast one) 11)infinite series (not compulsory but better to read)
